summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of west side of California Avenue, from West Brandon Street to West Juneau Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon together with wooden cross walks across West Findlay Street and to the center line of California Avenue only, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 43578, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
